mean_cn: n. 基准，标准检查程序；  v. 用基准问题测试（计算机系统等）
mean_en: something that can be used as a way to judge the quality or level of other, similar things
short_phrase: use the ruler as a benchmark
sentence: Compared to the benchmark set last year, you've really grown a lot.
sentence_trans: 和去年我们设下的基准比起来，你真的长高了不少。
